news.title: Falorin Vilka Sereva
news.summary: Toran valin ser'ka vilin vektar oornan vinol.
news.content: Toran valin ser'ka vilin vektar oornan vinol. Qaleri nas'vikin talvor senurik telva. Kalin sevek nor'ki jorvun, torin terak volaar inrelni vekar vin'tal.
news.author: Nirvin Kortev

details.equipment: Torkel varin'ka, selorin qarev, norven pirko.

news.title: Lirkar Uvaren Silvi
news.summary: Vela rin tarka surin tul ve'nerin qorin selvar.
news.content: Vela rin tarka surin tul ve'nerin qorin selvar. Qole noren sirte vin valka kilvor, qoran terno'tir larven. Torli venark nil, toren vekor inrik mar'kil ornati.
news.author: Selvor Tinrik

details.equipment: Orlan selvet, korvil toren, qirnen ralen.

news.title: Maril Qorik Vekorin
news.summary: Qorik vemar nilor verin til'kin qarnet.
news.content: Qorik vemar nilor verin til'kin qarnet. Kalir velrik tor'in, qirane norin selvikin norvel qorin vel'var. Til'ar kan qirnal venor vekari tornel.
news.author: Tirvel Sakari

details.equipment: Sel'nor tilka, ven'kil tarnal, varik qinvar.

news.title: Toren Valrik Selvari
news.summary: Valrik sel'vorin tul verin mirak venar torik.
news.content: Valrik sel'vorin tul verin mirak venar torik. Veralin til qarev, varuk rin toren si'var qulin taren. Vemarin ve'rit qarin lur'in tevolin kal'verin.
news.author: Kelrin Tivar

details.equipment: Valer noren'tin, ser'kin torvin, selar kilnor.

news.title: Sorek Tilver Vaklen
news.summary: Tilver nor ki'lore, kel'ver qirrin loken viren.
news.content: Tilver nor ki'lore, kel'ver qirrin loken viren. Torin venser qalen, til'vor sel qinari kel'in nerkal qin vin. Qalin ver sel orikan til'an valar ve'kin.
news.author: Lirven Valorin

details.equipment: Kal'vel til'kin, ser'tor kelven, toren valrik.

news.title: Til'vari Sen'kal Meran
news.summary: Sen'kal vi tor'an lurin kelan sel'tor, qilar ve'kan morin.
news.content: Sen'kal vi tor'an lurin kelan sel'tor, qilar ve'kan morin. Velran qoran, selnin kil'val noran mirin rilen. Toran kir senar tel, vel'tin mir kalver nalen qer’ik.
news.author: Kelvin Morak

details.equipment: Kel'tor nirik, selvin kirvol, val'ten nerik.

news.title: Pirvin Nor'tal Kirsen
news.summary: Nor'tal vel'kir serik ten'tar selvin nor qorin.
news.content: Nor'tal vel'kir serik ten'tar selvin nor qorin. Verin mir'kan se'nal kirven pirin ten’qel. Tor’al valin var'el tenarin qorar selnor.
news.author: Jorven Silra

details.equipment: Taren kel'vik, pirvi serel, qorin til'en.

news.title: Valerin Tin'kira Vekan
news.summary: Tin'kira verin tul'an merin, varin kelva toriken.
news.content: Tin'kira verin tul'an merin, varin kelva toriken. Qira laren sirin ve'lirin, norin kelton ni ten'val. Tor'al tirven nar'lor kelrak telvin qarel.
news.author: Melrik Serkar

news.title: Selmar Forik Nali'ten
news.summary: Nali'ten vi tal'ar selvor tir'al kan velir.
news.content: Nali'ten vi tal'ar selvor tir'al kan velir. Melran tenar kin valin tor'kal qin varik. Qir'ran mar'an sorin tilvel kelni ver'len.
news.author: Kelrin Velok

details.equipment: Sel'tor kalan, renven pirlik, mir'ten sorin.

news.title: Moren Tilvar Serka
news.summary: Tilvar vi sel'kar qorin kin'tar mel'vin torin.
news.content: Tilvar vi sel'kar qorin kin'tar mel'vin torin. Sere valar nin, valin ken’ril torven, kal vi’ten morin. Viri kel’al ve’ron ver’ik kelven torvi.
news.author: Qelran Tornik

details.equipment: Sorin venkel, tir'lin verin, sel'var nerik.

news.title: Ven'kal Tirin Marik
news.summary: Tirin sel've kin'mar ver'in kal'qor norik selren.
news.content: Tirin sel've kin'mar ver'in kal'qor norik selren. Velran tal'in qin'ar, selra kalvin nor'en qin ve'lon.
news.author: Lerin Valik

details.equipment: Tor'velin karvik, nir'an varel, sen've kal'en.

news.title: Sen'var Mirak Til'al
news.summary: Mirak ver'al kin tor'an sel'tor kel'vek qirin.
news.content: Mirak ver'al kin tor'an sel'tor kel'vek qirin. Vilor tel'kin rin'tor qaran sen’ral vi'tirlen.
news.author: Voren Talrik

details.equipment: Lirin senrak, kelren pirval, qin'val ne'lin.

news.title: Qiren Ver'al Sorval
news.summary: Ver'al kel'tor ni sel'var qirin marik volren.
news.content: Ver'al kel'tor ni sel'var qirin marik volren. Tiren qiran kelvan nor’al kal'ver torin ve’ri.
news.author: Marak Tenvil

details.equipment: Sel'vik tor'ral, mir'kin valin, qorin kel've.

news.title: Kel’vin Torak Qir'lin
news.summary: Torak ver'al pir’kin kal'tar ten velkora kelmar.
news.content: Torak ver'al pir’kin kal'tar ten velkora kelmar. Selqen varin tor’an kelten mir'or qaran velra.
news.author: Liran Sen'tal

details.equipment: Vek'tor silkin, kel'lin tiren, valnar norin.

news.title: Nir’ten Valin Sel'kor
news.summary: Sel'kor mir've tal'an ven qarin selnor morik.
news.content: Sel'kor mir've tal'an ven qarin selnor morik. Qiren nar'al tor'kel nir'val selten pir'lan ve'tar.
news.author: Marin Kelrik

details.equipment: Ten'ral ven’lar, mir'kal tor'in, valir kel'len.
